languages.text: "Мы должны сказать... размышления об этом неизвестном, рвущемся на свободу, пугают нас. Оно такое большое — невозможно исчислить, объяснить".
"We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."
languages.original_text: "Мы должны сказать... размышления об этом неизвестном, рвущемся на свободу, пугают нас. Оно такое большое — невозможно исчислить, объяснить".

traits.locale_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."
"We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."
"We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."
"We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."
"We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

languages.text: 「実を言うと…この逃げようとしている未知の何かのことを考えるのがとても恐ろしい。何しろ大きい。測ったり説明できないほどに」
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: 「実を言うと…この逃げようとしている未知の何かのことを考えるのがとても恐ろしい。何しろ大きい。測ったり説明できないほどに」

languages.text: “我们必须说……一想到这个未知的事物试图挣脱枷锁，我们就恐惧不已。它实在是过于庞大，甚至无法衡量，也无法解释。”
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须说……一想到这个未知的事物试图挣脱枷锁，我们就恐惧不已。它实在是过于庞大，甚至无法衡量，也无法解释。”

languages.text: "Wir müssen schon sagen ... Es macht uns Angst, über dieses Unbekannte nachzudenken, das sich zu befreien versucht. Es ist so gigantisch. Zu gigantisch, um es zu messen oder zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen schon sagen ... Es macht uns Angst, über dieses Unbekannte nachzudenken, das sich zu befreien versucht. Es ist so gigantisch. Zu gigantisch, um es zu messen oder zu erklären."

languages.text: « Nous devons reconnaître... que nous sommes effrayés à l'idée que cette chose inconnue se manifeste. Elle est si vaste, trop vaste pour être mesurée ou décrite. »
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons reconnaître... que nous sommes effrayés à l'idée que cette chose inconnue se manifeste. Elle est si vaste, trop vaste pour être mesurée ou décrite. »

languages.text: «Debemos admitir que... nos asusta pensar en esa incógnita que trata de liberarse. Es indeciblemente vasta. Demasiado para medirla o definirla».
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos admitir que... nos asusta pensar en esa incógnita que trata de liberarse. Es indeciblemente vasta. Demasiado para medirla o definirla».

languages.text: "Söylemezsek olmaz... Bu bilinmeyen şeyin özgür kalmaya çalıştığını düşünmek, bizi dehşete düşürüyor. O kadar engin ki... Enginliği, ne ölçülebilir ne de açıklanabilir bir boyutta."
languages.original_text: "We must say... It frightens us to think about this unknown something that is trying to break free. It is so vast. Too vast to measure or explain."

traits.locale_text: "Söylemezsek olmaz; bu bilinmeyen şeyin özgür kalmaya çalıştığını düşünmek, bizi dehşete düşürüyor. O kadar engin ki... Enginliği, ölçülerin veya açıklamaların ötesinde."
